p: Dulbeccoâ€™s minimum essential medium (DMEM), foetal bovine serum (FBS), l-glutamine and a penicillin/streptomycin mixture were obtained from Life Technologies (Carlsbad, CA). Raw 264.7, HeLa, CaCo-2 and MCF-7 cell lines were purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC-TIB-71, ATCC-CCL-2, ATCC-HTB-37, ATCC-HTB-22). Thiazolyl Blue Tetrazolium Bromide (MTT) was obtained from Sigma-Aldrich. Hydrochloric acid, disodium hydrogen phosphate, potassium chloride, sodium chloride and sodium dodecyl sulphate (SDS) were purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). Potassium dihydrogen phosphate was obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO).
